longDescription.description: Long descriptive text; code requires at least ~70 characters

envId.description: Environment identifier pattern (lowercase letters and dashes, 1-15 chars)

sdId.description: Security domain id pattern (lowercase letters, digits and dashes, 1-15 chars)

termDef.description: terminology Override to utilise terminology that is understandable to your audience

filePath.description: File system path (relative or absolute). Supports forward slashes (/) for Unix/Mac. Example: './schema' or '/usr/local/schema'

labels.description: Namespaced labels as key:value strings for categorization and plugin integration. Keys: max 63 chars (alphanumeric + ./_-). Values: max 253 chars (AWS-compliant: alphanumeric + ./_-+=:@ and spaces). Format: 'key:value' or 'prefix/name:value'
